title: Vaibhav Lakshmi Diamond Haaram with Emerald Accents
materials: G color) and natural Emeralds (square and drop cut).
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a delicate blend of traditional Telugu jewelry design with a contemporary aesthetic. The cascading diamond strands evoke a modern feel, while the central pendants featuring square and ornate drop designs are reminiscent of traditional temple jewelry. Fine milgrain detailing surrounds each gemstone, enhancing its brilliance. The emeralds add a touch of royalty and sophistication. The necklace features a graduated design with small golden bead drops for added elegance.
colors: accented by the vibrant green of the emeralds.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivahaalu)
and other celebratory events. Also suitable for high-profile social gatherings where you want to make a statement.
description: This Haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending traditional South Indian artistry with modern jewelry design. The high-quality diamonds and natural emeralds ensure lasting value and brilliance. The piece embodies both cultural significance and contemporary style, making it a treasured heirloom for generations to come. The Hyderabadi Polish adds a unique luster and enhances the overall beauty of the necklace. This is a statement piece that exudes elegance and sophistication.
